name: Card Combo
description:
Card Combo!

A numerical card game where you fight monsters. Combine cards of to build up your powerful attack. Use the elements to get the advantage on your opponents. Be quick about it though! The monsters only have so much patience. You play as a Wizard Duck, who innocently wandered into the wrong spooky forest at the wrong time.

Made by: LettucePie, and Houndfall
Made using: Godot, AeSprite, LMMS, Krita, and Audacity

The Game is currently in development. Once a more finished version is released, it will become available on Apple App Store and Google Playstore.
